member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO structure contains information used for key agreement algorithms.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.dwVersion
member.summary: A DWORD that indicates the version of the structure. Always set to three.

summary.para: A DWORD that indicates the key identifier to use.
This member can be one of the following values.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.OriginatorCertId
member.summary: A that identifies the public key of the message originator.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.DUMMYUNIONNAME.OriginatorPublicKeyInfo
member.summary: A structure that contains the public key of the message originator.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.UserKeyingMaterial
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB that indicates that a different key is generated each time the same two parties generate a pair of keys. The sender provides the bits of this BLOB with some key agreement algorithms. This member can be NULL.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: A that identifies the key-encryption algorithm and any associated parameters used to encrypt the content encryption key.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.cRecipientEncryptedKeys
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgpRecipientEncryptedKeys array.

member.name: CMSG_KEY_AGREE_RECIPIENT_INFO.rgpRecipientEncryptedKeys
member.summary: The address of an array of structures that contains information about the key recipients. The cRecipientEncryptedKeys member contains the number of elements in this array.
